TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CustomErrorCollection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection
Public NotInheritable Class CustomErrorCollection Inherits ConfigurationElementCollection

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类型允许访问`error`元素`customErrors`部分元素集合。The type allows access to the `error` elements of the `customErrors` section element collection. 它属于组，其中包括， ，和。It belongs to a group that includes the , , and . ## Examples 此示例演示如何以声明方式为指定值`error`元素`customErrors`部分中，还可作为元素的访问集合。This example demonstrates how to specify values declaratively for the `error` elements of the `customErrors` section, which can also be accessed as elements of the collection. 下面的配置文件示例演示如何以声明方式为指定值`error`元素。The following configuration file example shows how to specify values declaratively for the `error` elements. ``` ``` 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 更新配置文件之后调用的结果方法是依赖于选择。The result of updating the configuration file after calling the method is dependent upon the chosen. 若要更新的配置文件，你使用这两种重载之一：和。To update the configuration file, you use one of these two overloads: and . > [!NOTE] > 调用等效于调用。Calling is equivalent to calling . 如果你使用基方法，以下条件适用。If you use the .method, the following conditions apply. - 如果你通过或参数值，则`clear`元素插入到`clientTarget`当前层次结构级别上配置文件节。If you pass a or parameter value, then a `clear` element is inserted into the `clientTarget` section of the configuration file at the current hierarchy level. - 如果你通过参数值、 一系列`remove`元素添加到[请元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/17a0fa6e-a065-49cc-b900-ef73eda6a922)当前层次结构级别上配置文件。If you pass the parameter value, a series of `remove` elements are added to the [clientTarget Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/17a0fa6e-a065-49cc-b900-ef73eda6a922) of the configuration file at the current hierarchy level. 每个移除所有对引用`add`在层次结构中较高级别的父配置文件中定义的元素。Each removes all references to an `add` element defined in a parent configuration file at a higher level in the hierarchy. 当你使用，该集合的影响什么获取序列化到配置文件没有一个附加属性： ，即`false`默认情况下。When you use , there is one additional property on the collection that affects what gets serialized to the configuration file: , which is `false` by default. 以下条件适用。The following conditions apply. - 如果设置为`true`，`clear`元素插入到`clientTarget`当前层次结构级别上配置文件节。If the set to `true`, `clear` element is inserted into the `clientTarget` section of the configuration file at the current hierarchy level. 这将删除所有引用`add`层次结构中的较高级别上的父配置文件中定义的元素。This removes all references to the `add` elements defined in the parent configuration files at higher levels in the hierarchy. - 如果标志设置为`false`、`clear`从中删除元素`clientTarget`如果存在当前层次结构级别上配置文件节。If the flag is set to `false`, the `clear` element is removed from the `clientTarget` section of the configuration file at the current hierarchy level, if it exists. 方法实际上删除`add`中定义的元素`clientTarget`当前层次结构级别上配置文件节。The method actually deletes the `add` elements defined in the `clientTarget` section of the configuration file at the current hierarchy level. 它还会删除对层次结构中的较高级别上的父配置文件中定义的添加元素的所有引用。It also removes all references to the add elements defined in the parent configuration files at higher levels in the hierarchy. > [!NOTE] > `add`元素不会从删除`clientTarget`父配置文件的部分。The `add` elements are not deleted from the `clientTarget` section of the parent configuration files. ## Examples 下面的代码示例中移除所有对象从集合。The following code example removes all the objects from the collection. 中的代码示例是指类主题，若要了解如何获取的集合。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to get the collection. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection/CS/customerrorssection.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection/VB/customerrorssection.vb#6)]

summary.span: 从集合中移除 对象。

span.span: Removes a object from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法插入`remove`元素插入`customErrors`当前层次结构级别上配置文件节。The method inserts a `remove` element into the `customErrors` section of the configuration file at the current hierarchy level. 这将删除对引用`add`层次结构中的较高级别上的父配置文件中定义的元素。This removes the reference to the `add` element defined in the parent configuration files at higher levels in the hierarchy. > [!NOTE] > `add`元素不会从父配置文件中删除。The `add` elements are not deleted from the parent configuration files. `remove`元素仅仅是停用它们。The `remove` element merely deactivates them. 但是，方法会在当前的层次结构级别时实际删除。However, the method does actually delete them at the current hierarchy level. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何删除具有指定的状态代码的对象。The following code example shows how to remove the object with the specified status code. 中的代码示例是指类主题，若要了解如何获取的集合。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to get the collection. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection/CS/customerrorssection.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection/VB/customerrorssection.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法插入`remove`元素插入`customErrors`当前层次结构级别上配置文件节。The method inserts a `remove` element into the `customErrors` section of the configuration file at the current hierarchy level. 这是为了删除对引用`add`元素的父配置文件中定义更高级别的层次结构中。This is to remove the reference to the `add` element defined in the parent configuration files at higher-level in the hierarchy. **请注意**`add`元素不会从父配置文件中删除。**Note** The `add` elements are not deleted from the parent configuration files. 只需停用。They are merely deactivated. 但是，方法会在当前的层次结构级别时实际删除。However, the method does actually delete them at the current hierarchy level. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何删除的指定索引处的对象。The following code example shows how to remove the object at the specified index. 中的代码示例是指类主题，若要了解如何获取的集合。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to get the collection. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection/CS/customerrorssection.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection/VB/customerrorssection.vb#8)]
